divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking to work in the early morning. It was still night time and not a cloud in the sky. You could see a lot of stars, the sliver of the moon, and Venus very well. I was heading north bound on superior, just before 17th in Costa Mesa ca, when a brightly colored object flew across my vision from right to left. It looked like a giant light colored donut flying through the sky. It took about 3 seconds for it to cross over. I looked at my cell phone; it was 5:58 AM. I knew that if it was a meteor shower there would be more. Seconds later, a bright light shot across the sky heading north. It was just a streak of light. The funny thing is that the first object was heading east or south east, and seemed to zig zag when it was farther away; the second was heading north. The first object was very strange. I couldn't tell if it as glowing or just brightly colored, like a very light orange. At first it looked like a donut, and then it looked like an acorn, then like a donut again. It was very large and at a much lower altitude than the second one. The second seemed to be far up above me moving fast, like a comet; when the first seemed lower and in front of me, and moving much slower than the second. The whole thing happened so fast. It was freaky, and kind of cool.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Costa Mesa
There were no other sightings in Costa Mesa on or around September 9th 1998
Summary: two ufo's in costa mesa ca at 6 am on a clear night
